content:
Hi all, I'm passing on this message from Daniel Howard about a training that could be of interest:

I would like to invite NCAR staff that offer user support to a CyberFascilitation: Communications Training hybrid event Mon. July 31st from 1-5pm at the Mesa Lab, Damon Room or virtual. This takes place during the Cheyenne outage scheduled at this time. I believe your group and colleagues would benefit from this given the office hours and ESDS support you coordinate.

This training is part of the CyberAmbassadors program and NSF Award #1730137. Having participated in their program as a certified trainer, I plan to offer the communications module for peers and colleagues at NCAR.

Please forward this opportunity with your team as well as any others who might be interested. Please use this registration form to confirm attendance to the event or refer to the informational flyer here.
